errors.server-not-reachable: Could not connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.

admin.message: Attention if you disable a space it can not be booked!
admin.name: Name
admin.label: Add label

planning.save-or-cancel-before-proceed: Please save or cancel your booking before you proceed.
planning.if-delete-booking-cannot-undo: If you delete it, you won't be able to undo it.
planning.space-disabled-choose-another: This space has been disabled by the administrator. Please choose another one or contact the admin.
planning.last-week-space-already-booked: {{space}} which you booked last week, is already taken. Please select another space to complete your booking.
planning.last-space-already-booked: Hey, your last place is already booked. See what else is available...
planning.if-cancel-start-again: If you cancel it, you'll start from the beginning again.
planning.something-wrong-try-again: Something went wrong. Please, try again.
planning.name-added-to-favourites-success: {{name}} was successfully added to your Favorites.
planning.name-removed-from-favourites-success: {{name}} was successfully removed from your Favorites.
planning.name-added-to-favourites-error: Oops! There was a problem adding this user to your Favorites.
planning.empty-guest-booking: The guest information cannot be empty
planning.nobody-has-planned-yet: Nobody has planned this day yet.
planning.loading-bookings-error: The bookings could not be loaded due to a connection problem.
planning.booking-limit-exceeded-error: Cannot create more than one booking per day.
planning.booking-not-allowed-at-date-error: It is not allowed to create a booking for this day.
planning.booking-submit-error: The bookings could not be submited due to a connection problem.
planning.space-capacity-reached-error: The maximum capacity for the selected space has already been reached.
planning.space-disabled-error: The selected space is disabled and cannot be booked.
planning.space-not-found-error: The space could not be found.

meetup.we-could-not-find-any-no-matches: Mmmm... We couldn't find any matches
meetup.maybe-your-colleagues-did-not-plan-their: Maybe your colleagues didn't plan their time yet.
meetup.check-your-spelling-and-try-again: Check your spelling and try again.
meetup.select-one-of-the-spaces-to-see-who-is-c: Select one of the spaces to see who is coming.
meetup.find-people-you-enjoy-working-with: Find people you enjoy working with.
meetup.press-the-star-to-add-them-to-your-favor: Press the star to add them to your favourites.
meetup.see-what-they-planned-at-a-glance: See what they planned at a glance.

meeting.choose-preferences: Start with choosing your preferences - capacity and working area.
meeting.no-meeting-rooms-fit: No meeting rooms in the selected area fit {{capacity}} people
meeting.change-criteria: Change your criteria to see more available rooms.
meeting.no-meeting-room-with-name: There are no rooms with this name
meeting.check-search: Check your spelling, or use filters to find a suitable room for your meeting.
meeting.invalid-start-time: Your meeting must start before it can end.
meeting.invalid-end-time: Your meeting cannot end before it started.
meeting.list-will-appear-while-typing: Your list of rooms will appear while typing...

product-tour.welcome-to-new-look: Welcome to the new Seatti look!
product-tour.available-on-teams-app: Now also fully available on your mobile Teams app.
product-tour.switch-between-weekly-daily: Switch between weekly and daily view to plan your time, your way!
product-tour.change-language-or-feedback: If you want to change the language or give us some feedback, you can do it right here.
product-tour.days-and-weeks-booked-overview: Easily find which days and weeks you have already booked and which are still blank. Get a quick full overview with just one click.
product-tour.copy-bookings-from-last-week: Simply copy and save all your bookings from last week with just one click. Don't worry, you can still edit everything later.
product-tour.add-booking-preload-last: When you add a new booking, you have the option to preload your last one. You will be able to review and change it before confirming it.
